name: Egg Shoot Bubble 2018
description:
Egg Shoot Bubble 2018 is a type of puzzle classic game! If you are a big fan of game dynomite on PC. You will like this game Egg Shoot Bubble 2018.

Welcome! You mission is shoot bubble - egg into right postion to match at least 3 egg with same color and pass the level. Good Luck

How to play:
- Shoot egg - ball into right position
- Shoot bubble - egg to match 3 egg with same color
- Destroy more and more bubble to pass level
- No easy, because you don't have much time
- 9 kind of bubbles
